forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 61. South wind around 3 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms Likely then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely between 9am and 11am, then showers and thunderstorms likely between 11am and noon, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between noon and 1pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 2 to 12 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.
